title: Chickens pt 1: A Consideration of Eggs and Ethics
description: Let's talk about our relationship with chickens. I take a look at the labels on egg cartons and what they mean for the chickens that lay those eggs.I ask you to make an ethical commitment regarding eggs, and then move from that commitment to considering the economics of keeping your own chickens.
